StackControl::StackControl (   ) 
 

Member Function Documentation

BaseHandler * StackControl::GetHandler (  HandlerId  id  )  [static]
 

returns the handler of the given handler id (handler will be mounted, if it isn't available). ATTENTION: it is possible to get 0 as return value, if handler isn't accessible (e.g. due to a lock caused by an exclusiv handler like MtcVoiceHandler)
